TopicTitle: What is the best life support mod for a casual player to use.

Articles.Content: I'm tired of having to pretend that kerbals need good living conditions, but I also don't want to make my game too complex or confusing. I would prefer a mod that fells somewhat stock too.
This thread is going to be useful for you.
Short version: Snacks. USI if you want a little more complex. But Snacks is simple and very kerbal.
